components.name: GovUKBackLinkComponent
components.description:
A component that renders a GOV.UK back link.

This component implements the GOV.UK Design System back link component. It provides a consistent way to help users navigate back to the previous page.

Example :
```html
<ngx-govuk-back-link></ngx-govuk-back-link>
Example :
```html
```html
<ngx-govuk-back-link [inverse]="true"></ngx-govuk-back-link>
Example :
                             for use on darker backgrounds. Defaults to false.

See {@link https://design-system.service.gov.uk/components/back-link/ GOV.UK Back link}

components.name: GovUKButtonComponent
components.description:
A button component following the GovUK Design System

Example :
<ngx-govuk-button color="primary">Save and continue</ngx-govuk-button>
  • 'primary' (default) - Blue button for primary actions
  • 'secondary' - Grey button for secondary actions
  • 'warning' - Red button for destructive actions
  • 'inverse' - White button for use on dark backgrounds
components.rawdescription:
A button component following the GovUK Design System

```html
<ngx-govuk-button color="primary">Save and continue</ngx-govuk-button>
```
  - 'primary' (default) - Blue button for primary actions
  - 'secondary' - Grey button for secondary actions
  - 'warning' - Red button for destructive actions
  - 'inverse' - White button for use on dark backgrounds
components.templateData:
<button
  class="govuk-button"
  [ngClass]="{
    'govuk-button--secondary': color() === 'secondary',
    'govuk-button--warning': color() === 'warning',
    'govuk-button--inverse': color() === 'inverse',
  }"
  [disabled]="disabled()"
>
  <ng-content></ng-content>
  @if (start()) {
    <svg
      class="govuk-button__start-icon"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      width="17.5"
      height="19"
      viewBox="0 0 33 40"
      aria-hidden="true"
      focusable="false"
    >
      <path fill="currentColor" d="M0 0h13l20 20-20 20H0l20-20z" />
    </svg>
  }
</button>

components.name: GovUKButtonGroupComponent
components.description:
A component that groups GOV.UK buttons together with consistent spacing.

This component implements the GOV.UK Design System button group pattern. It provides consistent spacing between multiple buttons or links that are grouped together.

Example :
```html
<ngx-govuk-button-group>
  <ngx-govuk-button>Save and continue</ngx-govuk-button>
  <ngx-govuk-button color="secondary">Cancel</ngx-govuk-button>
</ngx-govuk-button-group>
Example :
The component accepts `ngx-govuk-button` components and elements with the `govuk-link` class
as content through content projection.

See {@link https://design-system.service.gov.uk/components/button/#button-group GOV.UK Button group}
components.rawdescription:
A component that groups GOV.UK buttons together with consistent spacing.

This component implements the GOV.UK Design System button group pattern.
It provides consistent spacing between multiple buttons or links that are grouped together.

```html
```html
<ngx-govuk-button-group>
  <ngx-govuk-button>Save and continue</ngx-govuk-button>
  <ngx-govuk-button color="secondary">Cancel</ngx-govuk-button>
</ngx-govuk-button-group>
```
```
The component accepts `ngx-govuk-button` components and elements with the `govuk-link` class
as content through content projection.

See {@link https://design-system.service.gov.uk/components/button/#button-group GOV.UK Button group}
components.sourceCode:
import { ChangeDetectionStrategy, Component } from '@angular/core';

/**
 * A component that groups GOV.UK buttons together with consistent spacing.
 *
 * This component implements the GOV.UK Design System button group pattern.
 * It provides consistent spacing between multiple buttons or links that are grouped together.
 *
 * @example
 * ```html
 * <ngx-govuk-button-group>
 *   <ngx-govuk-button>Save and continue</ngx-govuk-button>
 *   <ngx-govuk-button color="secondary">Cancel</ngx-govuk-button>
 * </ngx-govuk-button-group>
 * ```
 *
 * The component accepts `ngx-govuk-button` components and elements with the `govuk-link` class
 * as content through content projection.
 *
 * @see {@link https://design-system.service.gov.uk/components/button/#button-group GOV.UK Button group}
 */
@Component({
  selector: 'ngx-govuk-button-group',
  standalone: true,
  templateUrl: './button-group.component.html',
  changeDetection: ChangeDetectionStrategy.OnPush,
})
export class GovUKButtonGroupComponent {}

components.description:
A form component for date input that follows the GOV.UK Design System styling and behavior.

This component provides a set of input fields for day, month, and year with proper validation and styling. It integrates with Angular's form controls and supports accessibility features.

Example :
```html
<ngx-govuk-date-input
  formControlName="dateOfBirth"
  inputId="date-of-birth"
  min="1900-01-01"
  max="2050-12-31"
></ngx-govuk-date-input>
Example :
components.rawdescription:
A form component for date input that follows the GOV.UK Design System styling and behavior.

This component provides a set of input fields for day, month, and year with proper validation and styling.
It integrates with Angular's form controls and supports accessibility features.

```html
```html
<ngx-govuk-date-input
  formControlName="dateOfBirth"
  inputId="date-of-birth"
  min="1900-01-01"
  max="2050-12-31"
></ngx-govuk-date-input>
```

components.name: GovUKFooterComponent
components.description:
Footer component that displays standard GOV.UK footer

Example :
```html
<ngx-govuk-footer>
  <ngx-govuk-footer-links>
    <ngx-govuk-footer-link href="/help">Help</ngx-govuk-footer-link>
    <ngx-govuk-footer-link href="/cookies">Cookies</ngx-govuk-footer-link>
  </ngx-govuk-footer-links>
  <ngx-govuk-footer-meta>Built by the Government Digital Service</ngx-govuk-footer-meta>
</ngx-govuk-footer>
Example :
components.rawdescription:
Footer component that displays standard GOV.UK footer

```html
```html
<ngx-govuk-footer>
  <ngx-govuk-footer-links>
    <ngx-govuk-footer-link href="/help">Help</ngx-govuk-footer-link>
    <ngx-govuk-footer-link href="/cookies">Cookies</ngx-govuk-footer-link>
  </ngx-govuk-footer-links>
  <ngx-govuk-footer-meta>Built by the Government Digital Service</ngx-govuk-footer-meta>
</ngx-govuk-footer>
```
```
components.sourceCode:
import { ChangeDetectionStrategy, Component } from '@angular/core';

/**
 * Footer component that displays standard GOV.UK footer
 *
 * @example
 * ```html
 * <ngx-govuk-footer>
 *   <ngx-govuk-footer-links>
 *     <ngx-govuk-footer-link href="/help">Help</ngx-govuk-footer-link>
 *     <ngx-govuk-footer-link href="/cookies">Cookies</ngx-govuk-footer-link>
 *   </ngx-govuk-footer-links>
 *   <ngx-govuk-footer-meta>Built by the Government Digital Service</ngx-govuk-footer-meta>
 * </ngx-govuk-footer>
 * ```
 */
@Component({
  selector: 'ngx-govuk-footer',
  standalone: true,
  templateUrl: './footer.component.html',
  changeDetection: ChangeDetectionStrategy.OnPush,
})
export class GovUKFooterComponent {}

Example :
```html

  hint="As shown on your passport"

>

</ngx-govuk-form-group>

components.name: GovUKSkipLinkComponent
components.description:
A component that renders a GOV.UK skip link.

This component implements the GOV.UK Design System skip link component. It provides a way for keyboard users to bypass the top-level navigation links and jump to the main content on a page.

The skip link component is visually hidden until a keyboard press activates it.

Example :
```html
<ngx-govuk-skip-link href="#main-content">Skip to main content</ngx-govuk-skip-link>
Example :

See {@link https://design-system.service.gov.uk/components/skip-link/ GOV.UK Skip link}
components.rawdescription:
A component that renders a GOV.UK skip link.

This component implements the GOV.UK Design System skip link component.
It provides a way for keyboard users to bypass the top-level navigation links
and jump to the main content on a page.

The skip link component is visually hidden until a keyboard press activates it.

```html
```html
<ngx-govuk-skip-link href="#main-content">Skip to main content</ngx-govuk-skip-link>
```
```

See {@link https://design-system.service.gov.uk/components/skip-link/ GOV.UK Skip link}
components.templateData:
<a class="govuk-skip-link" [attr.href]="href()" data-module="govuk-skip-link"
  ><ng-content>Skip to main content</ng-content></a
>

components.name: GovUKTextInputComponent
components.description:
A form input component that follows the GOV.UK Design System styling and behavior.

This component provides a text input field with optional features like autocomplete, prefixes, and suffixes. It integrates with Angular's form controls and supports accessibility features.

Example :
```html
<ngx-govuk-text-input
  formControlName="firstName"
  inputId="first-name"
  autocomplete="given-name"
></ngx-govuk-text-input>
Example :

This component provides a text input field with optional features like autocomplete, prefixes, and suffixes.
It integrates with Angular's form controls and supports accessibility features.

  inputId="first-name"

variables.name: Template
variables.defaultValue:
(args) => ({
  props: { ...args, form: new FormGroup({ input: new FormControl(false) }) },
  template: `<form [formGroup]="form">
      <ngx-govuk-radio-group
        formControlName="input"
         ${argsToTemplate(args)}
      >
        <ngx-govuk-radio-option value="red" label="Red" />
        <ngx-govuk-radio-option
          value="blue"
          label="Blue"
          hint="This is the colour of the sky"
        />
        <ngx-govuk-radio-option value="green" label="Green" isDivided="true" />
      </ngx-govuk-radio-group>
    </form>`,
})
